document_data.name: Ilzimmer
document_data.symbol: A silver coat of arms with three crimson tears.
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ilzimmer''' ({{Pronounce|ILL|zim|mer|refs=}}) family was a significant member of the [[nobility of Waterdeep]], first gaining nobility status in {{YearlinkName|1248}}. Like House [[Amcathra]] and House [[Roaringhorn]], House Ilzimmer's influence also reached out to the town of [[Amphail]].
document_data.Organization: As of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, the patriarch of the Ilzimmer family was Lord [[Boroldan Ilzimmer]] with his consort [[Xantha Ilzimmer|Xantha]] and their eldest son as the designated heir, [[Thanvas Ilzimmer|Thanvas]]. During this period, there were forty-two living members of the Ilzimmer noble family.
document_data.Activities: The Ilzimmer family were most notably [[gem]] merchants. but also designed and sold jewelry and gowns. They were also keen cartographers, making and collecting maps. The family, and [[Dauner Ilzimmer]] in particular, had an interest in horse-breeding and racing.
document_data.Base of Operations:
The [[Ilzimmer Villa|family villa]] and main base was located in the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. The building was a distinctive and unique noble villa, consisting of two floors.<ref> A sublevel was accessible within the property via a portal, and provided two-way access from a lair that belonged to [[Misker|Misker the Pirate Tyrant]] in [[Trobriand's Graveyard|Trobriand’s Graveyard]], to House Ilzimmer.<ref>

Other Ilzimmer members owned properties within [[Waterdeep]], including [[Simon Ilzimmer]] who dwelled in a four-story row house in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]].<ref>
document_data.Members:
* [[Boroldan Ilzimmer]]: Patriarch and leader of the noble family in the mid–14{{th}} century. While a powerful and rich noble, he was not well-liked or popular among his peers. 
* [[Xantha Ilzimmer]]: The wife and consort of [[Boroldan Ilzimmer|Boroldan]]. 
* [[Thanvas Ilzimmer]]: The eldest son and heir of [[Boroldan Ilzimmer|Boroldan]] and [[Xantha Ilzimmer|Xantha]].
* [[Simon Ilzimmer]]: A mage and minor member of the family. He was described as tall and broad and was infamous for frequenting courtesans while shapedshifted. Sometime around [[1368 DR]], he was arrested, found guilty of murder, and hanged from the city walls.
* [[Jandar Ilzimmer]]: Jandar was one of many Waterdhavian nobles who joined the [[Deep Delvers]], a group of young nobles who went adventuring into [[Undermountain]]. He was a human [[fighter]] who fought with a [[broadsword]].
* [[Dauner Ilzimmer]]: The Chondathan lord Warder of [[Amphail]] sometime after [[1485 DR]]. He was described as somewhat of a pompous and lawful man with a deep love of horses.
